txt.en: Upon arriving at Hadâd-mezer, you see that the Orcs have a strong grasp on this area, making it difficult to get in or out.
Upon arriving at Hadâd-mezer, you see that the Orcs have a strong grasp on this area, making it difficult to get in or out.\n\nThe Orc-forces are strong, and their numbers must be thinned.
Hadâd-mezer is located to the south-east of Anazârmekhem of Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs in Hadâd-mezer.
You have successfully thinned the number of Orcs in Hadâd-mezer, making it much easier for dwarves of Anazârmekhem to get in and out of this area.
